attributes.action: make official recognition to the town and people of Wootton Bassett for the outstanding dedication and respect shown to the returning service men and women of the British armed forces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of Wootton Bassett show amazing dedication and demonstrations of respect to our dead service men and women when returning home from war zones.  Surely it is time the this town and it's people were given official recognition for this mark of respect.  Let us not forget that this happens purely on a voluntary basis.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
